translation.en: [Mia] What would you do if, for the last seven months,
translation.it: Cosa fareste, se negli ultimi sette mesi

translation.en: your life had been made of walls?
[Mia] Every morsel you eat had been monitored
translation.it: Tutto il cibo ingerito è stato monitorato

translation.en: and every pound of weight you put on, charted.
translation.it: e ogni chilo preso è stato annotato.

translation.en: And now, all you have to do to get out
translation.it: E ora tutto ciò che dovete fare per uscire da qui

translation.en: is not be crazy for the next five minutes.
translation.it: è non impazzire per i prossimi cinque minuti.

translation.en: [Mia] Could you do that?
Tick-tock.
Tick.
Tock.
[faintly] Mia?
Dr. Nell asked if you were listening.
translation.it: Il dott. Nell ha chiesto se ascolti.

translation.en: I am.
I have been, yeah.
Wonderful. Uh, well, we've been through your discharge papers.
translation.it: Ottimo. Abbiamo controllato i documenti per le dimissioni.

translation.en: That's sorted.
And Dr. Olsen has briefed you on your medication?
translation.it: La dott.ssa Olsen vi ha informati sui farmaci?

translation.en: -She did. Yes. Very thorough. -[Dr. Nell] That's what we like.
translation.it: - Sì. Molto accuratamente. - Così ci piace.

translation.en: I've sent the prescriptions through to the pharmacy,
translation.it: Ho mandato le ricette in farmacia.

translation.en: so Dad, if you want to pick it up,
and Mia, why don't you head up to the dormitory and gather your things?
translation.it: mentre Mia va a prendere le sue cose dal dormitorio.

translation.en: Meems, you good?
Yeah. Almost done.
[Dr. Nell] Now, in terms of your daily schedule and routine, we've spoken to your school
translation.it: Per quanto riguarda la routine quotidiana, abbiamo parlato con la tua scuola.

translation.en: and teachers and lunch staff will be on hand to help during the day.
translation.it: Gli insegnanti e il personale della mensa saranno sempre a disposizione.

translation.en: And, at home, as far as the meal plan goes, same routine as here.
translation.it: A casa, il piano alimentare dovrà seguire la stessa routine di qui.

translation.en: And, Mia, a big part of this has to come from you.
translation.it: E, Mia, gran parte dei risultati dipenderanno da te.

translation.en: Knowing your own body, respecting the recovery plan.
translation.it: Dal conoscere il tuo corpo e rispettare il piano di recupero.

translation.en: We're still in an adjustment period.
translation.it: È ancora un periodo di adattamento.

translation.en: [Mia] Get ready to lie…
So you will take it easy to begin with?
[Mia] Now.
Yeah.
Nice.
Good. Then you can shoot off.
[Mia sighs] Home.
[Mia] They say you never remember the smell of home until you've spent some time away.
translation.it: Dicono che non si ricorda l'odore di casa finché non si sta via per un po'.

translation.en: Well, turns out home is bigger than I thought.
translation.it: Casa mia mi sembra più grande di quanto pensassi.

translation.en: This car is home.
London is home.
Home is here.
Home is my dad.
How are you feeling?
Fine.
Back there you had a team of specialists to cater to everything.
-Out here you've just got little old me. -And little old Prozac.
translation.it: - Ora hai solo il tuo vecchio. - E il vecchio Prozac.

translation.en: There is always little old Prozac.
And teachers, and friends.
And Mum.
She did really want to be there today.
How's Alex?
Fine. Yeah, fine.
He's really looking forward to having you home.
translation.it: Non vede l'ora del tuo ritorno a casa.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, for now I just want to lie down in my own bed and be by my lonesome.
translation.it: Per ora voglio solo sdraiarmi sul letto e stare un po' da sola.

translation.en: Yeah.
Yep, yep, yep. You would want that, wouldn't you?
-Just a few family… -Dad. …and neighbors, and Mrs. McGinty.
translation.it: Solo qualche parente, i vicini e la sig.ra McGinty.

translation.en: Dad!
Oh, I thought that you might want to see everyone.
translation.it: Ho pensato che volessi vedere tutti.

translation.en: -Oh, Jesus fuck, Rick! -We've all really missed you.
translation.it: - Ma che cazzo, Rick! - Ci sei mancata tanto.

translation.en: So, I'm being thrown a party for having flown the cuckoo's nest?
translation.it: Festeggiate il mio ritorno dal nido del cuculo?

translation.en: -It's fine, fine, fine. -What're you doing?
-I am calling them, telling them to leave. -Wait. No. Fuck. Don't do that.
translation.it: - Li chiamo per dirgli di andare via. - Aspetta. Non farlo.

translation.en: -But you just said-- -It's fine.
-You sure? -Mm-hmm.
[Rick groaning] I'm an idiot!
[Rick] Please try and act surprised.
[all] Surprise! Surprise!
Oh my God, you guys, you shouldn't have!
[Mia] Fucking nailed that.
-Aw… -[Mia] Gran.
We couldn't resist, cherub.
-It's lovely to see you too. -Oh, you look so wonderful.
translation.it: - Che bello vederti. - Ti trovo benissimo.

translation.en: So healthy.
[Mia] Ugh. That word.
Thanks.
Heya.
[Mia] Jesus, hi.
I tried to talk them out of it, believe me.
[woman] Where's my girl?
Oh my God.
Hey, Mum.
Awkward hug incoming.
Darling, sweetheart. I'm so sorry I'm late.
The airport was absolutely horrendous…
[Mia] Or no hug. Yep, that's definitely worse.
Was everything alright with Dr. Nell?
[clicks tongue] All fine. Better than fine.
Oh, you are a star.
I'm so sorry I couldn't be more help.
translation.it: Scusa, non ho potuto aiutarti di più.

translation.en: [Mia] More?
You're here now.
[Gran] Mia?
A slice for the girl of the hour.
[Mia] You've got to be fucking kidding me.
[Gran] I made coconut sponge. Your favorite.
translation.it: Ho fatto il pan di Spagna al cocco. Il tuo preferito.

translation.en: -I'll just be a minute. -Sweetheart, you--
Overall, could have gone better.
[Mia] Okay, Mia, name five things you can see.
translation.it: Ok, Mia, nomina cinque cose che vedi.

translation.en: Loo roll.
Toilet brush.
Hand cream.
Soap.
Mirror.
Get your shit together, Mia. It's just cake.
translation.it: Datti una calmata, Mia. È solo una torta.

translation.en: You can't go back there.
[Rick] She's not having bloody cake.
[Gran] But she looks so healthy.
[Rick] She has an issue with food.
translation.it: Ha un problema con il cibo.

translation.en: [softly] Healthy.
[Gran] They wouldn't have let her out if she wasn't better.
translation.it: Se così fosse, non l'avrebbero fatta uscire.

translation.en: -You don't know… -She is okay.
Um… It does look delicious,
translation.it: - Tu non sai… - Sta bene. Ha un aspetto delizioso,

translation.en: but I think I might take a rain check. Uh…
The medication. I just feel a bit off.
translation.it: I farmaci. Mi sento un po' strana.

translation.en: Of course, darling.
Thank you, Gran.
Why not go and have a lie down?
Relax for a bit.
-[Mia's mum] Yeah. -[Gran] Yeah.
[Mia] If you drop a glass and it breaks, you can always glue it back together.
translation.it: Se un bicchiere si rompe cadendo, si può sempre incollarlo.

translation.en: But if you drop it again and again and again,
translation.it: Ma, se lo fai cadere in continuazione,

translation.en: eventually, it's going to be more glue than glass.
translation.it: alla fine sarà più colla che vetro.

translation.en: I wonder which I am now?
translation.it: Mi chiedo chi io sia ora.

translation.en: I used to write these lists every day.
Everything I ate down to the mouthful.
I thought they were helping me, drowning out the bad thoughts.
translation.it: Pensavo che mi aiutasse a soffocare i cattivi pensieri.

translation.en: I didn't realize they were drowning out the good as well.
translation.it: Non capivo di star soffocando anche quelli buoni.

translation.en: All the everyday beauty I forgot how to see.
translation.it: Non apprezzavo più la bellezza di tutti i giorni.

translation.en: And all the things I get to rediscover now.
translation.it: E di tutte le cose che ora posso riscoprire.

translation.en: There she is. How are you feeling, princess?
translation.it: Eccoti qua. Come ti senti, principessa?

translation.en: Good. Excited.
That's the spirit.
Morning, all.
[Rick] Good morning.
There's some breakfast for you here.
Oh, got to dash. Meeting a new client. I'm trying to convince them lavender is the new teal.
translation.it: Scappo. Devo convincere un nuovo cliente che il lavanda è il nuovo tè blu.

translation.en: Smoothie, anyone? [Rick] Remember what Dr. Nell said? Family meals?
translation.it: - Un frullato? - Non ricordi? Pasti in famiglia.

translation.en: Yes, but I haven't got time today.
translation.it: Sì, ma oggi non ho tempo.

translation.en: Well, can you make time?
[Mia] Glad to see nothing's changed here.
translation.it: Felice di vedere che non è cambiato nulla.

translation.en: [Viv] Sorry, did you say something?
translation.it: - Cosa dicevi? - Sarebbe bello se mangiassi con noi.

translation.en: [Rick] Might be nice for you to eat with us.
translation.it: - Cosa dicevi? - Sarebbe bello se mangiassi con noi. Il cibo non arriva in tavola se non lavoro, temo.

translation.en: [Viv] Food doesn't get on the table if I don't work, I'm afraid.
translation.it: Il cibo non arriva in tavola se non lavoro, temo.

translation.en: Now, before you go…
[Mia] Oh great, "a little chat."
We thought it might be best to have a little chat with you.
translation.it: Pensiamo che sia meglio fare due chiacchiere con te.

translation.en: Darling, chat? Yeah, yes. Um…
Mia. You know how much today is worth?
translation.it: Mia, capisci quanto è importante oggi?

translation.en: Flying solo for the first time in six months…
translation.it: Volare da sola per la prima volta dopo sei mesi…

translation.en: Seven months.
We're giving you this chance to show us that you're ready.
translation.it: Ti stiamo dando il modo di dimostrarci che sei pronta.

translation.en: We just want you to stay here and be happy with us.
translation.it: Vogliamo solo che tu resti qui e sia felice con noi.

translation.en: And we want you to be honest this time.
translation.it: E anche che tu sia sincera, stavolta.

translation.en: I know.
So, just for emergencies…
Oh, where's my phone?
Yeah, the advice says no social media.
translation.it: Beh, i social media sono sconsigliati.

translation.en: Might as well have given me a cup and string.
translation.it: Tanto vale darmi un bicchiere con uno spago.

translation.en: Right, now that's over with, to the office with me.
translation.it: Bene, abbiamo finito, andiamo in ufficio.

translation.en: Cinnamon.
Thanks for holding the fort.
Bloody mental baskets, aren't they?
You're a bit Disney this morning. Oh, look at me, just walking in the sun.
translation.it: - Sei un po' Disney stamattina. - Guardami, cammino sotto il sole.

translation.en: No one to tell me where to go, what to do.
translation.it: Nessuno mi dice dove andare o cosa fare.

translation.en: This is living, my brother.
This is…
[Mia] Oh shit.
I'll be nearby, okay?
My first friend.
Best friend.
Or so I thought.
-Hey, skinny. -[Mia scoffs]
What?
No. I read somewhere that you're supposed to acknowledge it. No repression and that.
translation.it: Ho letto in giro che va riconosciuto. Non bisogna reprimersi.

translation.en: You're looking taller.
Yeah, well, it's been a while.
translation.it: Beh, è passato un po' di tempo.

translation.en: No kidding.
I missed you, M.
Right.
-I'm sorry. -Since when did you start smoking?
translation.it: - Scusami. - Quando hai iniziato a fumare?

translation.en: Is that a veiled hint?
I like my lungs, they've always been on my side.
translation.it: Amo i miei polmoni, non mi hanno mai tradita.

translation.en: Look, M, can we…
Can we talk about it? About what happened.
translation.it: Possiamo parlarne? Di quello che è successo.

translation.en: [girl] Oh, would you look at this vision!
[Mia] Becca, quite possibly a Mensan.
translation.it: Becca, che potrebbe entrare nel Mensa.

translation.en: And Will, my wife.
Doth mine eyes deceive me!
Called in the cavalry.
Any longer and I might have just weed myself.
translation.it: Non ti vedo da una vita.

translation.en: -You literally visited me three days ago. -Oh, three miserable days.
translation.it: - Sei venuto a trovarmi tre giorni fa. - Tre giorni terribili.

translation.en: [Mia] These are the greatest people of all time.
translation.it: Sono le persone migliori di sempre.

translation.en: -Too long. -Way too long.
Never again?
No promises. Never promises.
Never again. I'm all yours now.
translation.it: Mai più. Ora sono tutta vostra.

translation.en: Let's go fuck up some shit. [laughs]
Mia, are you okay?
Yeah, yeah, I'm fine.
Uh, excuse me!
Hey, there you are. I thought you'd gone overboard.
translation.it: Ehi, eccoti qua. Pensavo che fossi caduta giù.

translation.en: -You're good, yeah? -Oh, fuck good.
She's better than good, she's free.
translation.it: Sta più che bene, è libera.

translation.en: So much to see, so much to do. I mean, where do we even start?
translation.it: C'è tanto da vedere e da fare. Da dove iniziamo?

translation.en: I was thinking maybe the cinema? Or the skate park?
translation.it: Stavo pensando al cinema. O allo skatepark.

translation.en: Oh… [laughs] We haven't gone there in forever.
translation.it: Non ci andiamo da una vita.

translation.en: Uh, the cinema though, we can go this Friday?
translation.it: Però al cinema ci andiamo venerdì?

translation.en: -Becs, this Friday we're supposed to be-- -[Will] Oh shit.
Is that…
Oh God, hide me.
-I told her that I moved to Cameroon. -Why? Who is she?
translation.it: - Le ho detto che ero in Camerun. - Perché? Chi è?

translation.en: The one that wanted to role-play as Mary, Queen of Scots or the one who wanted to stick a finger up--
translation.it: Quella che si vestiva da Maria Stuarda o quella del dito in…

translation.en: Yes. Her.
So you had… sex with her?
translation.it: Quindi hai fatto sesso con lei?

translation.en: Who hasn't he had sex with? That's the real question.
translation.it: La domanda è: "Con chi non l'hai fatto?"

translation.en: You can talk. At least I'm not going at it with my boss.
translation.it: Da che pulpito. Io non scopo col mio capo.

translation.en: Seriously, you guys!
What? You said no salacious gossip till she was back.
translation.it: Beh? Avevi detto niente gossip fino al suo ritorno.

translation.en: She's back!
Only just. She's still in recovery.
Ah! She is recovered. Look at her.
And the only thing she's starved of right now is gossip. And I will be your waiter this evening.
translation.it: L'unica cosa di cui ha fame è il gossip, e stasera le farò da cameriere.

translation.en: And excuse me, me and my boss are not just "at it."
translation.it: Comunque, fra me e il mio capo non è solo sesso.

translation.en: It was magical. In the store cupboard at work.
translation.it: È stato magico. Nella dispensa al lavoro.

translation.en: He kept giving me eyes over the cheese counter.
translation.it: Mi fissava dal bancone dei formaggi.

translation.en: I still get a tingle when I think about Manchego.
translation.it: Ho ancora i brividi se penso al Manchego.

translation.en: Well, I'm glad I still have one respectable friend.
translation.it: Sono felice di avere ancora un'amica rispettabile.

translation.en: Here's to our interminable virginity.
Ha-ha! She's a woman now!
What? No! You too?
-With who? -Just this guy at Reading.
translation.it: - Con chi? - Un tizio al festival di Reading.

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me? Wasn't worth mentioning. It was no big deal.
translation.it: - Non me l'hai detto. - Perché non è stato niente di che.

translation.en: No big deal?
I'm pretty sure you compared it to… [panting] …a religious experience.
translation.it: Io ricordo che l'hai paragonata a un'esperienza mistica.

translation.en: Oh, speaking of drunken mistakes, did you hear what Steph got up to at Nick's after we left?
translation.it: Parlando di errori da ubriachi, sapete cos'ha combinato Steph da Nick?

translation.en: -[Cameron] No. -[Becca] No.
[Mia] Fuck, how can I have missed so much in seven months?
translation.it: Cazzo, come posso essermi persa così tanto in sette mesi?

translation.en: -Hey. Bro. -All right?
-Yo. Lads! -What's up?
It's like bloody Sesame Street in here.
translation.it: Sembra di essere a Sesamo apriti.

translation.en: Right?
Steph! Leanne! Sarah, you gorgeous thing!
You'll get used to it.
Yo, Becs, what you sayin'?
You're mates with Jonah? But we hate Jonah.
translation.it: Ora siete amici di Jonah? Non lo odiavamo?

translation.en: He has the good weed.
There are multiple weeds?
I am sorry…
that I didn't tell you about Reading. I thought with everything--
translation.it: non averti detto di Reading. Pensavo che tu…

translation.en: It's fine.
I get it. You were protecting me.
The concept of virginity is some bullshit invention of the patriarchy anyway.
translation.it: Il concetto di verginità è un'invenzione del patriarcato.

translation.en: Yeah.
Come on. We're this way.
Oi. Out my chair. Oh, of course, sorry.
translation.it: - Ehi. Via dal mio posto. - Ma certo, scusami.

translation.en: Uh, move along, dickhead.
Hello!
Welcome, everyone, on this very special morning.
translation.it: Benvenuti a questa mattina molto speciale.

translation.en: [Mia] Christ. Not you too, Miss Lambert.
As discussed in the last registration,
the lovely Mia Polanco is rejoining us.
translation.it: l'adorabile Mia Polanco è tornata fra noi.

translation.en: So everyone, please be extra, especially welcoming.
translation.it: Quindi, per favore, siate più accoglienti del solito.

translation.en: -Just like we talked about. -[Mia] Perfect.
That's perfect.
In AA, one of the first things they tell you
translation.it: Una delle prime cose che si dicono agli alcolisti

translation.en: is to avoid people, places, and things that trigger you.
translation.it: è di evitare persone, luoghi e cose che possono essere un innesco.

translation.en: This doesn't exactly help when your trigger is something
translation.it: Ma non è il massimo quando l'innesco è qualcosa

translation.en: you literally need in order to literally live.
translation.it: di cui hai letteralmente bisogno per vivere.

translation.en: And it isn't just eating that's the problem. It's after.
translation.it: E il problema non è mangiare in sé. È dopo.

translation.en: It's the aching, inside-out panic of feeling the food settle.
translation.it: È il doloroso panico di sentire il cibo depositarsi.

translation.en: Every day.
Trying always to find a better reason than "because they tell me to."
translation.it: Cerco sempre di trovare un motivo migliore di "perché mi dicono di farlo".

translation.en: Hi.
My name is Mia Polanco.
One moment.
There you go.
[Mia] Of course they saddle me with the Dwayne Johnson of potatoes.
translation.it: Ovviamente mi hanno dato una patata alla Dwayne Johnson.

translation.en: Nope, it's fine.
Just a simple enormous potato.
[Becca] So what are we going to serve?
-Tequila? -[Will] Going to be absolutely rattled.
-Absolutely. -[Will shushing]
Hey.
What are you guys talking about?
[Will] I was just saying that Yorkie is the ultimate gay chocolate bar.
translation.it: Dicevo che la Yorkie è la barretta gay per eccellenza.

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Bollocks. What about Twix or Mounds Bar?
translation.it: Cazzate. E allora il Twix e il Mounds?

translation.en: Twix is pan, Mounds Bars are lesbian. Keep up.
translation.it: Il Twix è pansessuale, il Mounds lesbica.

translation.en: And what are Skittles?
-Ooh, Skittles. -Orgy.
Mia. I didn't know you'd be back today.
translation.it: Mia. Non sapevo che saresti tornata oggi.

translation.en: [Mia] Alison. Entirely her own adjective.
Yeah, I figured it was time to--
translation.it: Sì, ho pensato che fosse ora…

translation.en: Great. Great.
Hey, guys.
-Hi, Cameron. -Hi.
So, wow. [scoffs] It's been forever.
When's the last time I saw you? Like, Year 10?
translation.it: Da quanto non ti vedo? Dal primo anno?

translation.en: I was here last year. It's been like seven months.
translation.it: Ero qui l'anno scorso. Sono passati sette mesi.

translation.en: Yeah. Ages.
So, how are you? How was it?
It was… It was fine. You know how it is.
translation.it: È andata bene. Sai come funziona.

translation.en: Well, no. I don't. I've never been to a mental hospital.
translation.it: Beh, no. Non sono mai stata in un ospedale psichiatrico.

translation.en: So, uh, A-levels are kicking my arse. -Alison, how are you finding them? -[Alison sighs]
translation.it: Sto impazzendo coi test dell'ultimo anno. Alison, tu come li trovi?

translation.en: I totally bombed the first assessment in Bio
translation.it: Ho toppato il primo test di Bio

translation.en: and I've never heard of any of the set texts for English.
translation.it: e non conosco i testi assegnati per Lettere.

translation.en: -One of them is Hamlet. -I know, right? It's crazy.
translation.it: - Uno di quelli è Amleto. - Lo so. È pazzesco, no?

translation.en: So, was your room all padded and stuff?
translation.it: La tua stanza era tutta imbottita?

translation.en: -Uh, no, that's not really-- -Don't get me wrong.
I totally get where you're coming from.
One summer, I literally lived off of nothing but Polo Mints.
translation.it: Un'estate, non ho mangiato altro che caramelle Polo.

translation.en: -Oh, I'm so sorry, that sounds-- -No, don't be.
translation.it: - Oh, mi dispiace, dev'essere… - No, tranquilla.

translation.en: I looked great. I wore crop tops for like two months.
translation.it: Stavo benissimo. Ho indossato dei crop top per due mesi.

translation.en: Are you going to Theo's party on Friday?
translation.it: Andrete alla festa di Theo venerdì?

translation.en: -Why are you all being weird? -He probably didn't know to invite you.
translation.it: - Perché siete strani? - Forse non sapeva che tornassi.

translation.en: -It probably won't be that good anyway. -Oh.
At his last party, Will was literally like,
"I've peaked. Kill me now. Life will not get better than this."
translation.it: "Ora posso anche morire. La vita non sarà mai meglio di così".

translation.en: [Mia] I thought I needed to get back to the person I was before,
translation.it: Pensavo di dover tornare alla persona che ero prima

translation.en: to the things I loved, but they all kept moving while I stood still.
translation.it: e alle cose che amavo, ma è cambiato tutto tranne me.

translation.en: Parties, drinking, drugs, sex. That's the new normal.
translation.it: Feste, alcol, droga, sesso. È la nuova normalità.

translation.en: That's what I need to catch up on, or else I'll be left behind.
translation.it: È quello che devo recuperare, altrimenti rimarrò indietro.

translation.en: I'm way more in the mood for the cinema anyway.
-Oh yeah. -Mm. Me too.
Or we could stay in, do Clueless again.
translation.it: O potremmo restare chiusi in casa.

translation.en: Like, if… if you guys want. I don't really care.
translation.it: Se vi va. Per me è lo stesso.

translation.en: [Mia] A party is the perfect place to catch up.
translation.it: Una festa è perfetta per incontrare gente.

translation.en: All the birds, one stone.
Where are you going?
The other side.
This is a good idea. This is a good idea.
-This is a good-- -Theo! Oh God. I'm so sorry.
translation.it: - È un'ottima… - Theo! Oddio, scusami tanto.

translation.en: -[Theo] That's okay. -[Mia] Sorry.
-No, that's okay. It's, um… -Hi.
[Mia] Theo. The cutest of the cute.
translation.it: Theo. Il più carino dei carini.

translation.en: Mia! You're back. Oh, that's bloody ace.
Can I come on Friday?
What?
To the party.
Is it, like, cool if I come?
Oh right.
Yeah, sure. If… you want to.
Really?
I mean, great, perfect. Um…
Is there like an invitation I need to get in, or…
translation.it: Mi serve una specie di invito o…

translation.en: Uh, no, that's not really a thing.
Right. Of course.
So does that mean there won't be any party bags?
translation.it: Quindi non hai previsto dei cotillon?

translation.en: Damn, I knew there was something I forgot.
Yeah, 'cause the ones at your fifth birthday were, like, next-level.
translation.it: Quelli del tuo quinto compleanno furono super.

translation.en: -Is that why you want the invite? -Only reason. For the Chupa Chups.
translation.it: - Ci vieni per questo? - Già, per i Chupa Chups.

translation.en: Guess I got some serious shopping to do.
translation.it: Devo fare un bel po' di shopping.

translation.en: I'll see you Friday, then.
Yeah, you will.
What the hell was that?
Just told Theo that I'd stop by the party if he was cool with it.
translation.it: Ho detto a Theo che passerò dalla festa, se per lui va bene.

translation.en: And he was.
Okay, I'm loving this energy.
Are you sure this is a good idea? You just came out of the hospital.
translation.it: Sicura che sia una buona idea? Sei appena tornata.

translation.en: Becs, I love you, but you really need to stop fussing.
translation.it: Becs, ti voglio bene, ma devi smetterla di agitarti.

translation.en: I'm fine.
Look, I wouldn't be here if I wasn't.
I'm going to a party with my favorite people,
translation.it: Andrò a una festa coi miei amici

translation.en: and I'm gonna have some fucking fun for once.
translation.it: e finalmente mi divertirò un po'.

translation.en: -Who are you and where did you put Mia? -[laughing]

translation.en: [Viv] Mia! Becca is here!
Say what you want about Viv, that woman smells damn good!
translation.it: Di' quello che vuoi su Viv, ma quella donna ha un buon profumo!

translation.en: Oh! I could have stayed in that hug until uni.
translation.it: Sarei restata in quell'abbraccio per sempre.

translation.en: A fucking party. An actual fucking party.
translation.it: Una cazzo di festa. Sarà una festa pazzesca.

translation.en: We are going to do all the things!
-Alcohol's a given, right? -It is.
And they probably hand out drugs like Party Rings?
translation.it: E magari offriranno droga per dessert?

translation.en: Weird comparison, but yes.
But…
sex…
Big leap.
Oh, come on. That's what parties are really about.
translation.it: Ma dai. Alle feste funziona così.

translation.en: That's the thing I'm missing. The thing to take me to normal.
translation.it: Mi manca solo quello per farmi diventare normale.

translation.en: Normal ain't all it's cracked up to be.
translation.it: La normalità non è bella come sembra.

translation.en: Loads of slobbery boys called Henry.
translation.it: Ci sono tanti ragazzi bavosi di nome Henry.

translation.en: That's where it gets murky for me. All the others you just jump in, but…
translation.it: È questo che non funziona in me. Tutti voi vi buttate liberamente.

translation.en: me, I'm missing that… key.
translation.it: Ma a me manca quella… chiave.

translation.en: That first step.
-Becs. -Mm-hmm?
How do you kiss?
[giggling] What?
Why?
More importantly, who?
Oh, does it matter? I just… I never really learned how
and you clearly know a hell of a lot more than I do now.
translation.it: e tu sai chiaramente molto più di me, ora.

translation.en: Please! One guy, one tent. I'm hardly top shagger.
translation.it: Ma va! Un tizio, una tenda. Non sono una scopatrice.

translation.en: Oh, but Scotty T. You've been there.
translation.it: Ma se sei Scotty T. Tu l'hai fatto.

translation.en: You've seen the other side of the virgin coin. Come on.
translation.it: Non sei più una verginella. Andiamo.

translation.en: Tell me your ways.
Why do you need to know?
Because if I tried to kiss someone now, it'd be like when I was a kid,
translation.it: Perché, se baciassi qualcuno, sarebbe come quando da bambina

translation.en: just smashing Barbie and Ken's faces together.
translation.it: facevo urtare Barbie e Ken faccia a faccia.

translation.en: I mean, I don't know what to do with my hands.
translation.it: Non so cosa fare con le mani.

translation.en: -Or when to close my eyes. -Calm down. It's not that complicated.
translation.it: - O quando chiudere gli occhi. - È facile.

translation.en: Or the tongue. I mean, what does that do?
translation.it: E la lingua? Come si muove?

translation.en: Is it round and round like the spin cycle? Or do you sort of just…
translation.it: In tondo come una centrifuga? O semplicemente…

translation.en: Ugh. What lizard are you kissing?
Don't mock me. I'm pissing stress hormones.
translation.it: Non prendermi in giro. Sto pisciando ormoni dello stress.

translation.en: Okay, come here. Kiss me, then.
translation.it: Ok, vieni qui e baciami, allora.

translation.en: See, now, imagine there's a third nose between your noses.
translation.it: Immagina che ci sia un terzo naso tra i due nasi.

translation.en: What?
That's when you close your eyes. When you're nose-width apart.
translation.it: Quando sei lontana solo un naso, chiudi gli occhi.

translation.en: -Nose-width? -Mm-hmm.
Good. Now, bringing in the tongue.
A very good tip, if you're ever unsure what you're doing,
translation.it: Se non sei sicura di cosa fare,

translation.en: pay attention to how the other person's kissing you
translation.it: fa' attenzione a come bacia l'altro

translation.en: and kiss them back the same way. Got it?
translation.it: e fai la stessa cosa. Capito?

translation.en: Mm. Okay, but how-- Oh.
Good. That wasn't bad.
Pretty good for your first go.
Now, that jumper? Mm-mm, it's just wrong.
A very large man wore it golfing.
What, that's all your advice? "Pretty good" is far from perfect.
translation.it: È i consigli? "Non male" è tutt'altro che "perfetto".

translation.en: Perfection takes 1,000 hours and, ooh, the party starts in two.
translation.it: La perfezione richiede 1.000 ore e la festa inizia tra due.

translation.en: Now, makeup, do you want to go loud or sexy?
translation.it: È l'ora il trucco. Vuoi essere vistosa o sexy?

translation.en: Yes.
Heading out now. Bye, guys!
-Thank you for having me, Mr. and Mrs. P. -Hold up.
translation.it: - Grazie per l'ospitalità, signori P. - Aspetta.

translation.en: You've had your evening snack? I had it earlier.
translation.it: - Hai fatto lo spuntino serale? - Sì, prima.

translation.en: Oh gosh, don't you both look lovely.
Bit dressed up for the cinema, eh?
Oh, don't be silly.
Finally rubbing off on you. Up to the nines wherever you go.
translation.it: Finalmente mi segui. Sempre elegante ovunque tu vada.

translation.en: -Right, you taught me well. -[Viv] Have fun, darling.
translation.it: - Già, mi hai insegnato bene. - Divertiti, tesoro.

translation.en: -Did she look a little-- -She's fine.
translation.it: - Non sembrava un po'… - Sta bene.

translation.en: -Maybe I should-- -She's fine.
You're weird. What?
It's nice seeing you like this. You look like Mia.
translation.it: È bello vederti così. Sembri Mia.

translation.en: -Oh, about time! -Hey. Right, you ready?
-[Mia] So ready. -Mm-hmm?
[Becca] Here we go.
Now this, my friend, is a party.
translation.it: Belle mie, questa sì che è una festa.

translation.en: That is nasty.
[Mia] Holy fuck.
-This is everything. -[Will] Mia, come on.
So yeah, work was fucking weird.
translation.it: Sì, aveva un sapore strano, cazzo.

translation.en: Or at least smelled fucking weird. Something about pancetta going off.
translation.it: O perlomeno un odore strano. Simile alla pancetta scaduta.

translation.en: Is pancetta bacon or cheese? [Will] I should really know that.
translation.it: - La pancetta è bacon o formaggio? - Dovrei saperlo.

translation.en: Thank you.
Thanks.
[Mia] How is it so easy for them?
translation.it: Perché per loro è così facile?

translation.en: How can they just eat and drink?
translation.it: Come fanno a mangiare e bere?

translation.en: How am I 16 and can't just do that?
translation.it: Perché a16 anni non ci riesco?

translation.en: Want one?
[Mia] Mayday. Meal plan. Don't drink.
translation.it: Attenta. Il piano alimentare. Non bere.

translation.en: Oh, what are you guys doing here?
translation.it: Ehi, ragazzi, che ci fate qui?

translation.en: We were literally talking about this with you the other day.
translation.it: Ne abbiamo parlato con te l'altro giorno.

translation.en: Are you drinking on your medication? I'd imagine you're on like a fuck-ton.
translation.it: Bevi sotto farmaci? Pensavo che ne prendessi un sacco.

translation.en: Um, yeah. Kind of.
That is so fun. Get proper wavy gravy.
translation.it: Che spettacolo. Ti sballerai alla grande.

translation.en: [Mia] A shot's okay. At least I can track what's in that.
translation.it: Un cicchetto può andare. Almeno so cosa c'è dentro.

translation.en: -[Cameron] Let's do it. -Oh yeah.
No, no, no, no. This is just for Little Miss Mia.
translation.it: No. Sono tutti per la signorina Mia.

translation.en: It's just enough to get her buzzed.
[Mia] Shit, three shots?
Maybe I can skip something tomorrow.
If you're gonna do something wrong, do it right.
translation.it: Se devi fare qualche errore, fallo per bene.

translation.en: [Mia] I need to show them I'm better, that I can be normal.
translation.it: Devo dimostrare che sto bene, che posso essere normale.

translation.en: [Will] Okay.
Yeah.
Yes, Mia! Fucking legend. Salud!
translation.it: - Sì, Mia! Sei mitica, cazzo. - Alla salute!

translation.en: What? It's just a buzz.
translation.it: Che c'è? È solo un po' di alcol.

translation.en: [Mia] Just enough to get me buzzed.
…this massive family pickle, and it's just been a bit of a conundrum.
translation.it: …un enorme problema familiare, un vero dilemma.

translation.en: Oh, sorry. What did you say?
Sorry, I think I have plans.
translation.it: Scusa, credo di avere da fare.

translation.en: Sorry.
What a classy pair we make.
Are you… Are you holding up okay? Yeah?
[Mia] Can I try?
-[coughing] -Okay. That's enough for you.
-[coughing] -Mm.
Who would choose to do that?
I don't think I've seen you this happy in…
translation.it: Non credo di vederti così felice da…

translation.en: I don't even know.
Whose fault is that?
-I thought you didn't want me to visit. -Seven fucking months, Cam.
translation.it: - Pensavo non volessi visite. - Sette mesi, Cam.

translation.en: I know.
Look, I am sorry I didn't visit you, okay?
translation.it: Mi dispiace di non essere venuto a trovarti, ok?

translation.en: I know I fucked up. But I…
translation.it: Lo so, sono stato stronzo. Ma…

translation.en: That's all I'm going to apologize for because I know you're gonna hate me for it.
translation.it: Ti chiedo scusa solo per le visite. So che mi odi per questo,

translation.en: But I… don't regret telling your parents. I didn't know what else to do. Your fly's undone.
translation.it: - ma dovevo proprio dirlo ai tuoi. - Hai la patta aperta.

translation.en: She's gone. She's gone!
[girl] Coming. Fucking hell, that was close.
"Quick shag in the bushes," he said. "Oh, what could go wrong," he said.
translation.it: "Una sveltina tra i cespugli, cosa potrebbe andare storto?"

translation.en: Are you okay?
It's never gonna be like it was, is it?
translation.it: Non sarà mai più come prima, vero?

translation.en: Give her some time.
Come on.
[Mia] So, this is what everyone always goes on about.
Drinking is what helps you belong.
Open up. Join in.
translation.it: Ad aprirsi. A unirsi agli altri.

translation.en: Because here's the thing about getting drunk,
translation.it: Perché il vero motivo per ubriacarsi,

translation.en: all the shit at the back of your head,
translation.it: a parte tutta la confusione mentale

translation.en: twisting in the pit of your stomach,
it all just trickles down to something else.
-[dance beat thumping] -Something sweeter.
It strips you back to basics.
And leaves you, just you,
floating through space.
-[dance music playing] -You all right?
[Mia] And dancing.
How could I not have known how good it feels to just… [gasps]

translation.en: [Mia] No words.
No words, except…
Who is she?
[Theo] Mia! You came!
Hey. Hi.
Hey and hi.
I've lost the plot. Help me find it before it thickens.

translation.en: How about I help you find some water first?
translation.it: Magari prima ti aiuto a trovare dell'acqua.

translation.en: [Theo] Here we are.
Two more of these, and you'll be right as rain.
translation.it: Altri due bicchieri e ti riprenderai.

translation.en: Thank you, sailor.
The party seems to agree with you.
I feel very heavy but very light.
I think I finally understand house music.
translation.it: Finalmente ho capito la musica house.

translation.en: [Mia] He's so lovely.
That's it. That is definitely nose-width.
translation.it: Ci siamo. È alla distanza di un naso.

translation.en: [Mia] Oh God. Oh fuck.
Did I do it wrong? Did I…
Oh shit.
Oh goddamn…
That's the other thing about getting drunk.
-Are you okay? -[Mia] When you fuck up…
translation.it: - Stai bene? - Se fai un casino…

translation.en: I'm sorry.
…you fuck all the way up.
Oh fuck. I'm sorry.
What the fuck?
I'm sorry.
[Theo] Yes.
Yeah. Yes, she's coming around.
Okay, I will.
Don't worry, Mia, the ambulance is nearly here.
translation.it: Tranquilla, Mia, l'ambulanza è quasi qui.

translation.en: [Mia] No. No.
[Mia] This is not happening. This seriously cannot be…
translation.it: Non sta succedendo. Non può essere…

translation.en: Fuck.
-Jesus fucking Christ, M. -What happened?
Are you alright?
The embarrassment's terminal, but… apart from that, I'm fine.
translation.it: L'imbarazzo è totale ma, a parte questo, sto bene.

translation.en: They just gave me a lecture about underage binge-drinking.
translation.it: Mi hanno fatto una predica sull'alcolismo dei minori.

translation.en: Apparently, three shots still count.
Please tell me no one rang my parents.
translation.it: Non avete chiamato i miei, vero?

translation.en: Seriously, you don't know how this goes. They will send me straight back, no questions asked.
translation.it: Sul serio, non potete immaginarlo. Mi rimanderanno lì dentro.

translation.en: [Cameron] Okay.
We promise.
[Becca] Why did you come out so hot?
"Party, kiss,
get drunk,
drugs, sex."
It's a shopping list.
Bucket list.
All the things I didn't realize I'd have to catch up on.
translation.it: Tutte cose che non sapevo di dover recuperare.

translation.en: You were trying to do all this in one night?
translation.it: E volevi fare tutto in una notte?

translation.en: I just wanted to show you that I was okay.
translation.it: Volevo solo dimostrarvi che sto bene.

translation.en: That I could keep up.
That you didn't have to hide from me.
translation.it: Che non dovete farmi evitare nulla.

translation.en: It's fucking stupid.
I'm fucking stupid.
No. No, it's not.
You're not.
Mia, this… this is great.
Yeah, you can do all of this stuff.
translation.it: Già, puoi fare tutte queste cose.

translation.en: -I'll help you. -We'll all help.
I'm not like you, I'm…
I'm broken.
-[Will] Stop that. -Yeah.
You're not broken. You just didn't have us.

translation.en: Yeah, we're here to help you do all the stupid stuff.

"The Fuck It Bucket."
What do you think?
I just really fucking missed you guys.
All right. Come on, wild man.

Rest you up for all the sex you'll be having, eh?
